greenbananas.networking

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenbananas.networking.Session

  • public class Session
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game session between the computer and the client. Firebase Realtime Database is used for synchronization. Each session has a unique sessionId, and an entry in Firebase Realtime Database (RTDB)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeSession()
      Closes the currentSession and deletes the entry in the RTDB
      static void createSession() 
      java.lang.String getSessionId()
      Returns the id of the current session
      boolean hasSessionClosed()
      Checks if the current session is closed
